data.author: BOBdotEXE

changelog.release_notes:
+Added 'bt disconnect' notification!
the watch will show "-connection lost-" and double vibrate to let you know when you louse connection
+Finally got github linked (source code released)

+added a battery check every 60 seconds, as apposed the the previous... never. 
(before it would only check battery upon loading the watch face)

minor fixes:
-removed (not yet setup) config option
+added icon

data.description:
The perfect watch for the dystopian future!
Flickering neon, worn text, and visual glitches to change hour and minute!
This supports 12 hour time (am/pm) and 24 hour time! and more colors coming soon!
------------------
All the fonts used are used in accordance with there licenses:
Time font: Tonik BRK Font [by Ænigma Fonts]
Date/DoW font: Flipside BRK Font [by Ænigma Fonts]
battery font: NinePin Font  [by Digital Graphic Labs]

latest_release.release_notes:
+Added 'bt disconnect' notification!
the watch will show "-connection lost-" and double vibrate to let you know when you louse connection
+Finally got github linked (source code released)

data.title: CyberPunk Neon dystopia
